nodes.text: The Sphere of Military Command was one of the five Spheres of Influence of the reconstituted Sith Empire that was created by Empress Acina after the Eternal Empire conquest. The Sphere was the combination of the Spheres of Defense of the Empire, Military Offense, and Military Strategy and was led by Dark Council member Darth Krovos.

The Sphere of Military Command was a power-base of the Sith Empire responsible for the defensive and offensive operations of the Empire. It was established by Empress Acina to lessen the infighting between Dark Council members, and was one of the five seats that succeeded the twelve Spheres of Influence. The Sphere was led by Darth Krovos.
